1 c NLSL Version 1.9.0 beta 2/12/15
2 c----------------------------------------------------------------------
3 c ====================
4 c module MTSDEF
5 c ====================
6 c
7 c Defines positions of elements of mts array used in lbasix and setmts
8 c routines
9 c
10 c mts(1) lemx Maximum even L
11 c mts(2) lomx Maximum odd L
12 c mts(3) kmn Minimum K (K<0 => jK = -1)
13 c mts(4 kmx Maximum K
14 c mts(5) mmn Minimum M (M<0 => jM = -1)
15 c mts(6) mmx Maximum M
16 c mts(7) ipnmx Maximum pI
17 c mts(8) ldelta L increment
18 c mts(9) kdelta K increment
19 c mts(10) ipsi0 Tilt angle flag
20 c mts(11) in2 Nuclear spin
21 c mts(12) jkmn Minimum jK
22 c mts(13) jmmn Minimum jM
23 c
24 c----------------------------------------------------------------------
25 c
26  module mtsdef
27  implicit none
28 c
29  integer, parameter ::
30  # nlemx=1,nlomx=2,nkmn=3,nkmx=4,nmmn=5,nmmx=6,nipnmx=7,
31  # nldel=8,nkdel=9,nipsi0=10,nin2=11,njkmn=12,njmmn=13,
32  # ntrc=7
33 c
34  end module mtsdef
